data.title: Steve's Uptown Cafe.
data.text: This is a very popular lunch location in downtown Jackson. Their black bean burrito that is served on Fridays is an excellent choice.for a light lunch.

data.title: Fast and Economical Lunch
data.text: There were several great soup and sandwich options. My food was delicious, inexpensive, and it was prepared quickly. I will definitely return if I'm in the area again.

data.title: Very glad I tried this place out
data.text: My friend and I have been trying out different local eateries and Steve's happened to work for us by chance. I had recently had some oral surgery and my choices for eating were rather limited and we needed it to be close to where we were at near the Planetarium. So, we went to Steve's. I had the Roasted Tomato, Black Olives and Pesto quiche. It was AWESOME. My other option was soup and the guy behind the counter let me try it to decide whether or not to order it. It was the organic vegetable soup. I ended up not getting it due to time but it was awesome too! I would totally come back here when I am able to fully enjoy the rest of the menu and will encourage others to do the same when in the area! I am only giving it 4 stars for now, simply cause I haven't had much on the menu.

data.title: My favorite downtown Lunch spot
data.text: I eat here for lunch at least twice a week.  They also have breakfast here that starts at 8am.  My favorite things are the sandwiches and soups and cookies.

data.title: Thoughtful lunch cuisine in the heart of downtown
data.text:
Steve's is close to work, so I sometimes end up heading down to pick up a quick lunch. They always have good specials, but, especially in the winter, my go-to menu pick is the Senegalese Chicken Soup, which is hearty, has a taste unlike any of the other soups you're going to find downtown, and is enough to fill you up without breaking past about $5.  They also have delicious cookies and baked goods, and I recommend the sweet potato or the lemon tea cake.

In addition to lunch (closing at 2pm), they have a good, hot breakfast, mostly simple southern breakfast food, biscuits, eggs, etc.

data.title: Always great
data.text: Steve's is the kind of place that serves food that seems like it was prepared just for you, at hom, by your mama. Its delicious and dependable. The lunch specials vary from lasagne, to quiche to chicken enchiladas. We have even purchased whole quiches and everyone always wants to know where they came from.

data.title: Great Food and Great Service
data.text: I've always had a good experience at Steve's.  The breakfast is good and the lunch is great.  Everything I've tried on the menu is good and I always leave satisfied.  Everyone who works there is friendly .  They even know the regular's names. Always a safe choice for a good dining experience.  Plus, the desserts are awesome too!
